name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clarence OUTLER, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clarence OUTLER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Rudolph S. Pallastrone, Geo. A. Bachetti, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Glenn S, Gitomer, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
359 A.2d 365
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clarence OUTLER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 22, 1976.
Decided July 6, 1976.
Rudolph S. Pallastrone, Geo. A. Bachetti, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Glenn S, Gitomer, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
